newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: BolsWessanen to sell shares in Luijckx.
newsitem.headline: BolsWessanen to sell shares in Luijckx.

text.p: Dutch food and drinks group BolsWessanen NV said on Friday that it expected to reach agreement to sell its shares in unit Luijckx Beheer BV to Luijckx's management and to L. Hoogenboom trading company.
Luijckx makes chocolate decoration products for bakeries and the ice cream industry and has annual sales of 32 million guilders, it said.
BolsWessanen said this transaction takes place against book value and fits in with BolsWessanen's previously announced policy of concentrating on its core business.
No more financial details were given on the deal.
